Fix WebSocket authentication and sync backend API changes

Updated Android client to match backend API specification:

   - Added apiToken field to Driver model for future token support

   - Terminal: Added sessionId, model, canResume, startedAt, createdAt, lastAccessAt fields
   - TerminalConfig: Added support for id, command, model, system_prompt, allowed_tools, etc.
   - Added new models: ResizeRequest, DirectoryEntry, DirectoryListing
   - Fixed HealthResponse to match backend structure

3. API Endpoints: Add missing terminal operations:
   - POST /api/terminals/{id}/resume - Resume a saved terminal
   - POST /api/terminals/{id}/resize - Resize terminal
   - DELETE /api/terminals/{id} - Delete terminal
   - GET /api/filesystem/dir - List directory contents

4. Repository: Extend TerminalRepository with new methods:
   - resumeTerminal\(\), resizeTerminal\(\), deleteTerminal\(\), listDirectory\(\)

5. Dependency: Update Compose BOM to 2024.06.00 for compatibility
